job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Our client is looking for an exceptional Backend Software Engineer with a strong background in developing high-performance, scalable software solutions tailored for Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments and distributed systems. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform that caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications.

   You will work on a range of cloud technologies such as streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack.

   Job specifics:
     * Implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks and open-source.
     * Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems.
     * Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation., The Next Chapter W&S
   Gemeente:
   The Hague
   Contracttype:
   Vast contract, Voltijds
   Categorieën:
   Software Engineer, Back-End Developer
   Opleidingsniveau:
   Bachelor
   Master
   Gepubliceerd:
   24.11.2023
   Deel nu:
   Vind een job die bij jou past
job_details.full_text:
Backend (Cloud) Software Engineer

Our client is looking for an exceptional Backend Software Engineer with a strong background in developing high-performance, scalable software solutions tailored for Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments and distributed systems. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform that caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications.

   You will work on a range of cloud technologies such as streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack.

   Job specifics:
     * Implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks and open-source.
     * Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems.
     * Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation., The Next Chapter W&S
   Gemeente:
   The Hague
   Contracttype:
   Vast contract, Voltijds
   Categorieën:
   Software Engineer, Back-End Developer
   Opleidingsniveau:
   Bachelor
   Master
   Gepubliceerd:
   24.11.2023
   Deel nu:
   Vind een job die bij jou past

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional backend software engineering for cloud-native environments and distributed systems, with a mention of LLM applications but no deep involvement in generative AI model development or fine-tuning. The core responsibilities and technologies described align more with a general backend role than a specialized GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.phrase: implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks and open-source
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the creation and implementation of backend systems, which falls under traditional software development.

job_tasks.phrase: collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the integration aspect of software development, working with other teams to ensure the backend systems function correctly within the larger application.

job_tasks.phrase: drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly MLOps, comprehensive testing, instrumentation, and documentation are crucial aspects of productionizing and maintaining software systems, aligning with the operational side of engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: tailored for Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments and distributed systems
job_tasks.justification: Understanding the target environment (cloud-native, Kubernetes, distributed systems) is essential for designing appropriate backend solutions, indicating a level of business/technical context understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform that caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand the purpose and requirements of the platform, specifically its role in supporting LLM applications, which requires business and application context.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams
